name: Rabih Abou-Khalil
description: '''Rabih Abou-Khalil''' ({{langx|ar|ربيع أبو خليل}}, born August 17, 1957) is an [[oud]] player and [[composer]] born in Lebanon, who combines elements of [[Arab music|Arabic music]] with [[jazz]], [[classical music]], and other styles. He grew up in [[Beirut]] and moved to [[Munich]], Germany, during the [[Lebanese Civil War]] in 1978.
